H0.text: When did the US TV series, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, begin its six years of seasons. 1995

H1.text: When did the US TV series, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, begin its six years of seasons. 1992

H2.text: When did the US TV series, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, begin its six years of seasons. 1999

H3.text: When did the US TV series, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, begin its six years of seasons. 1997

A4.text: Buffy the Vampire Slayer first aired on March 10, 1997.

A5.text: The show aired on The WB from March 10, 1997, to May 22, 2001, and later on UPN from October 2, 2001, to May 20, 2003.
